products.name: Yum Nam Tok
products.description: Grilled Meat Salad With Fresh Thai Herbs, Ground Roasted Rice, Chilli and Lime (a Choice of Beef or Pork).

products.name: Pla Muk Tod
products.description: Deep Fried Squid In Batter Served With Spicy Cucumber and Peanut Sauce.

products.name: Larb

products.name: Rice

products.name: Panang Gai
products.description: Chicken cooked in red curry sauce and coconut milk with a touch of shredded kaffir leaves served with steamed rice. Choice of chicken, prawns or vegetables and tofu.

products.name: Massaman Curry
products.description: A southern dish of slowly cooked beef and sweet potato.

products.name: Bangkok Style Noodles
products.description: A tasty Bangkok style noodle soup with bean sprouts, minced pork, fish balls, fried king prawns topped with ground roasted peanuts, chilli, fresh lime juice and coriander.

products.name: Pad Prik Gang
products.description: Fried battered sea bream fillets or tiger prawns with red curry paste, fresh chilli, herbs and spice served with steamed rice. Choice of sea bream, prawns or vegetables and tofu (v).
